titleStmt.title: A touch-stone to try (by our knowledge, belief, and life) whether we be Christians in name onely, or Christians in deed. Or, The character of a true beleever, that walks in some measure answerable to the gospell, his Christian profession, and the millions of mercies he hath received. / By R.Y. of Roxwell in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: and are to be sold by Andrew Crooke, at the signe of the Greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard
